code:
```verilog
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic areset,
    input logic [7:0] d,
    output logic [7:0] q
);
    always_ff @(posedge clk or posedge areset) begin
        if (areset) begin
            q <= 8'b00000000;
        end else begin
            q <= d;
        end
    end
endmodule
```
